name: Cleaner EloHell
description: Elohell with less details, cleaner look (no borders, no share buttons, smaller images).
additional_info:
Created with Firefox 16.0.2

V1.0
- Initial launch, it may change in the future.

V1.1
- Removed the bottom facebook iframe
- Added license

V1.2
- Adjusted the fake play button on videos so it's centered
